Headline: Temporary #54B South Cicero Reroute at Cermak/24th
ShortDescription: 54B South Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted near Cermak/24th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#54B South Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Cicero, Cermak, 49th Place, 24th Place into terminal, and resume normal route, due to street blockage near Cermak/24th.

Allow extra travel time.
